meanings.definition: A musical note with the time value of four beats in common time.
meanings.sent1: In the song, the semibreve lasted for a long time.
meanings.sent2: The semibreve is an important note in music theory.
meanings.sent3: The semibreve decided to take a break from being played all the time.
meanings.sent4: Her voice held the audience like a semibreve in a symphony.
meanings.sent5: The semibreve stood out among the other notes, commanding attention.
